sentences: Betty and Mathildi Maggira also known as "The Maggira sisters"  ("Οι αδέρφες Μαγγίρα" in Greek) are two Greek television presenters, and a comedy act.
The two sisters have also worked with Greek singer, Sakis Rouvas, in a successful concert series at STARZ from 2008–2009 and both have been featured as solo acts in various television shows.
